titleStmt.title: Pandosto the triumph of time. VVherein is discouered by a pleasant historie, that although by the meanes of sinister fortune truth may be concealed, yet by time in spight of fortune it is most manifestlie reuealed. Pleasant for age to auoyde drowsie thoughtes, profitable for youth to eschue other wanton pastimes, and bringing to both a desired content. Temporis filia veritas. By Robert Greene Maister of Artes in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Orwin for Thomas Cadman, dwelling at the signe of the Bible, neere vnto the north doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The historie of Dorastus and Fawnia.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible, neere vnto the north doore of Paules
